game - Variable in class kulami.control.GameController
 
Game - Class in kulami.game
The class Game represents the current state of a Kulami game.
Game(Player, int, DisplayFlags) - Constructor for class kulami.game.Game
Private constructor that encapsulates common tasks of all public constructors.
Game(Board, Player, int, DisplayFlags) - Constructor for class kulami.game.Game
Constructs a new Game using an existing Board object.
Game(String, Player, int, DisplayFlags) - Constructor for class kulami.game.Game
Constructs a new Game using a 200-character board code.

A marble has been placed.

GameController - Class in kulami.control
The GameController is the layer between the GUI and the game state.
GameController() - Constructor for class kulami.control.GameController
Constructs a GameController, initializes a Mainframe object and displays it.
GameDisplay - Class in kulami.gui
This class is notified when the game state changes and displays the game using a MapPainter.
GameDisplay(GameObservable, JPanel, GameDisplayAdapter) - Constructor for class kulami.gui.GameDisplay
Constructs a new GameDisplay, creates a MapPainter, and registers with a GameObservable .
gameDisplayAdapter - Variable in class kulami.gui.GameDisplay
 
GameDisplayAdapter - Interface in kulami.gui
Adapter interface for user input from the GameDisplay
gameLevel - Variable in class kulami.game.Game
 
GameMap - Class in kulami.game.board
GameMap represents a board of 17 panels together with its current configuration of marbles.
GameMap() - Constructor for class kulami.game.board.GameMap
Private constructor that encapsulates general initialization tasks.
GameMap(Board) - Constructor for class kulami.game.board.GameMap

GameMap(String) - Constructor for class kulami.game.board.GameMap
Construct a GameMap given a 200-character board code.
gameMap - Variable in class kulami.game.Game
 
GameObservable - Interface in kulami.game
The GameObservable interface defines the methods that the Game class must implement for GameObservers.
GameObserver - Interface in kulami.game
Classes that want to be notified of game state changes have to implement this interface.
gameObservers - Variable in class kulami.game.Game
